name: MoveAudioVisualizer
description: Moves the Audio Visualizer towards the bottom of the screen, or to a position of your choice.

playLayer.name: Apply changes to Play Layer
playLayer.description: Applies all of the below changes to the Play Layer, where you play(test)/complete levels.

editorLayer.name: Apply changes to Editor Layer
editorLayer.description: Applies all of the below changes to the Editor Layer, where you build/edit levels.

raydeeuxMode.name: RayDeeUx Mode
raydeeuxMode.description:
Sets the positions, rotations, and scales of the Music and SFX Visualizers to the developer (RayDeeUx)'s preferences, so that you don't need to tweak the numbers so often.

Enabling this setting WILL override whatever values you have set for all of the following settings.

musicPositionX.name: Music Visualizer X Position
musicPositionX.description: Sets the X positon of your Music visualizer.

musicPositionY.name: Music Visualizer Y Position
musicPositionY.description: Sets the Y positon of your Music visualizer.

musicScale.name: Music Visualizer Scale
musicScale.description: Sets the scale of your Music visualizer.

musicRotation.name: Music Visualizer Rotation
musicRotation.description: Sets the rotation of your Music visualizer.

sfxPositionX.name: SFX Visualizer X Position
sfxPositionX.description: Sets the X positon of your SFX visualizer.

sfxPositionY.name: SFX Visualizer Y Position
sfxPositionY.description: Sets the Y positon of your SFX visualizer.

sfxScale.name: SFX Visualizer Scale
sfxScale.description: Sets the scale of your SFX visualizer.

sfxRotation.name: SFX Visualizer Rotation
sfxRotation.description: Sets the rotation of your SFX visualizer.
